item.title: US justice department investigates Epstein's alleged ties to Clinton and banks after Trump request
item.description: Trump said on social media he was seeking investigations into Bill Clinton and Larry Summers, as well as JP Morgan and other major banks.

item.title: Three killed after bus crashes into Stockholm bus stop
item.description: Three others have have been injured in the crash in the Swedish capital, police say.

item.title: Hearn spies Eubank's weight as Benn wants redemption
item.description: Chris Eubank Jr vows to put on a "fight of the decade contender" in his rematch with Conor Benn on Saturday.

item.title: Man charged following suspected fake admiral at Remembrance event
item.description: Police said the incident at the Remembrance Sunday event caused "significant public concern".

item.title: What does Trump want with boat strike campaign?
item.description: The US has justified its air and naval campaign as necessary to fight drug smuggling into the US.
